thread.section_title: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Skipper (formerly Jetaport) | hiskipper.com | 2 of 59
thread.title: Amanda Weaver
thread.title_full: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) reviewed by Amanda Weaver

author: Amanda Weaver
title: Amanda Weaver
text: I was recommended Skipper while I was creating my wedding website through The Knot and it was such a great choice! Skipper made it so easy to choose hotels, get bids and reserve a room block for our wedding! I would recommend this to anyone looking for reservation blocks for any event!
